content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 our mouton noir black sheep hat might just be the easiest coziest winter accessory you will ever knit made with just one skein of gorgeous hand-dyed boucle yarn from julie asselin it s worked straight up in stockinette in-the-round from cast-on to the beginning of crown decreases when the knitting is finished the brim is created by folding the fabric up from the cast-on edge and tacking it in place with four simple stitches at evenly spaced intervals et voilà the softest most comfortable hat you could ask for and stylish to boot yarn julie asselin boucle 70% alpaca 30% highland peruvian wool 240 y 219 m /100 g 1 skein shown in mouton noir or approximately 190 yds 174 m of a similar worsted weight yarn
